title: World premieres and a sauna gathering: Finnish film at IFFR 2026
content:
The Institute and partners hosted a networking and sauna event at IFFR 2026, celebrating Finnish film and fostering industry collaboration.

The post World premieres and a sauna gathering: Finnish film at IFFR 2026 appeared first on Finnish Cultural Institute for the Benelux.

title: Learn Finnish at the first-ever Brussels Multilingualism Week!
content:
Spend Valentine's Day learning Finnish with us at Bourse! The Institute is excited to be part Brussels Multilingualism Week together with the EUNIC Brussels cluster.

The post Learn Finnish at the first-ever Brussels Multilingualism Week! appeared first on Finnish Cultural Institute for the Benelux.
creator: Margareeta Lauronen

title: Juha Vehmaanperä’s exhibition infuses traditional craft and fashion with punk energy
content:
Finnish knitwear artist Juha Vehmaanperä’s first major solo exhibition, Craft Punk opens at the Gallery of the Architecture & Design Museum on 20.2.2026.

The post Juha Vehmaanperä’s exhibition infuses traditional craft and fashion with punk energy appeared first on Finnish Cultural Institute for the Benelux.

title: Our picks from the Oulu2026 European Capital of Culture programme
content:

title: 2026: New year, new horizons
content:
Johanna Råman shares more on 2026 at the Finnish Cultural Institute for the Benelux. It's all about artists, international exchange, and cultural policy in action!

content:

title: Strong Finnish presence at IFFR 2026
content:
